author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Gain After Higher Yields Attract Buyers
text:
U.S. government bonds advanced Thursday, pushing yields back down from multiyear highs.
According to Tradeweb, the yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note fell to 2.888%, from 2.913% Wednesday, which was its highest close since Jan. 9, 2014. Yields fall as bond prices rise.
The 10-year Treasury yield reached as high as 2.941% in...
